NavigatorGetBattery.summary:
The getBattery() method provides information about the system's battery.
It returns a battery promise, which resolves with a object providing some properties to get the battery status also some events you can handle to monitor the battery status.
This implements the {{domxref("Battery Status API", "", "", "nocode")}}; see that documentation for additional details, a guide to using the API, and sample code.

remarks.para: Since Chrome 103, the Navigator.getBattery() method of {{domxref("Battery Status API", "", "", "nocode")}} only expose to secure context.

blockquote.para: Access to this feature may be controlled by the Permissions-Policy directive Permissions-Policy/battery.

NavigatorGetBattery.returns: A {{JSxRef("Promise")}} that fulfills with a object which you can use to get information about the battery's state.
